author: BrickbyBrickDFM
title: Must Read!
review: This is a must-read book.  Sarah Herman provides an in-depth history of LEGO and how it has survived for so long.  I was introduced to series that I had never heard about until this book.  This book help me renew my love for these little bricks.  You may think you know everything about LEGO, however, I promise you will learn something new from this book.
